tool.name: IDPosteriorErrorProbability
tool.description: Estimates probabilities for incorrectly assigned peptide sequences and a set of search engine scores using a mixture model.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir out && #if "out_plot_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir out_plot && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' #if "out_plot_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -out_plot 'out_plot/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #end if #if len(str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',')) == 0 | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' '$out' #if "out_plot_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'out_plot/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$out_plot' #end if #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: split_charge
param.label: The search engine scores are split by charge if this flag is set
param.help: Thus, for each charge state a new model will be computed

param.name: top_hits_only
param.label: If set only the top hits of every PeptideIdentification will be used

param.name: ignore_bad_data
param.label: If set errors will be written but ignored
param.help: Useful for pipelines with many datasets where only a few are bad, but the pipeline should run through

param.name: prob_correct
param.label: If set scores will be calculated as '1 - ErrorProbabilities' and can be interpreted as probabilities for correct identifications

param.name: number_of_bins
param.label: Number of bins used for visualization
param.help: Only needed if each iteration step of the EM-Algorithm will be visualized

param.name: incorrectly_assigned
param.label: for 'Gumbel', the Gumbel distribution is used to plot incorrectly assigned sequences
param.help: For 'Gauss', the Gauss distribution is used

param.name: max_nr_iterations
param.label: Bounds the number of iterations for the EM algorithm when convergence is slow

param.name: neg_log_delta
param.label: The negative logarithm of the convergence threshold for the likelihood increase

param.name: outlier_handling
param.label: What to do with outliers:
param.help: - ignore_iqr_outliers: ignore outliers outside of 3*IQR from Q1/Q3 for fitting. - set_iqr_to_closest_valid: set IQR-based outliers to the last valid value for fitting. - ignore_extreme_percentiles: ignore everything outside 99th and 1st percentile (also removes equal values like potential censored max values in XTandem). - none: do nothing

param.name: fdr_for_targets_smaller
param.label: Only used, when top_hits_only set
param.help: Additionally, target/decoy information should be available. The score_type must be q-value from an previous False Discovery Rate run

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
param.label: Optional outputs
param.option: out_plot (txt file (if gnuplot is available, a corresponding PDF will be created as well.))

data.name: out_plot
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: out_plot
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "out_plot_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Estimates probabilities for incorrectly assigned peptide sequences and a set of search engine scores using a mixture model.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/release/2.6.0/html/TOPP_IDPosteriorErrorProbability.html
